bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Bringing cross appeals in relation to pre-existing applications for leave to appeal
bcl:section.bcl:text: A respondent who has been served a pre-existing application for leave to appeal may bring a cross appeal by complying with Rule 8 and, for that purpose, a reference in Rule 8 to "notice of appeal" must be read as though it were a reference to "pre-existing application for leave to appeal".
